trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> interface to create a request message that acts as a method call on a remote object.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks.
A remoting client sends a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> message to a server.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper"></xref> class by wrapping an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> interface.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
A message that acts as an outgoing method call on a remote object.
Gets the number of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments passed to a method.
Gets an array of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the arguments passed to a method.
Gets a method argument, as an object, at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument as an object.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument.
Gets a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an `out` parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument that is not marked as an `out` parameter.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an **out** parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument that is not marked as an **out** parameter.
Gets a value indicating whether the method can accept a variable number of arguments.
The method belongs to a remote object.
`true` if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
Gets an array of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
Gets the <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
Gets the name of the invoked method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the invoked method.
Gets an object that contains the method signature.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the method signature.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The message acts as a request method call on a remote object.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Gets the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
The URI of a remote object.
